column1:
Roses are red, violets are blue, 
In this vast world, there's only one you.

Twinkling stars in the night sky so bright, 
Guiding travelers till the morning light.

A gentle breeze whispers through the trees, 
Carrying stories of the rustling leaves.

The sun sets low with a fiery glow, 
Leaving behind the night's soft shadow.

Waves crash upon the distant shore, 
Singing a melody of the ocean's roar.
